summary: "Salad Days: A Decade of Punk in Washington, DC (1980-90)" examines the early DIY punk scene in the Nation's Capital. It was a decade when seminal bands like Bad Brains, Minor Threat, ... See full summary Â»
cast: Fred Armisen|Brendan Canty|Dave Grohl|Andre 'Whiteboy' Johnson|Tim Kerr|Ian MacKaye|Thurston Moore|George Pelecanos|Henry Rollins|Tom Sherwood
title: Salad Days
